start.annotation: These strewn thoughts, by the mountain pathway sprung

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line r07_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r09_line r10_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r09_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r09_line r11_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_phr r13_line

LMNL.text: And with these flowering thorns I dare to weave

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_phr r14_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r14_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r14_line r15_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r14_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r14_line r16_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r17_quatrain r18_s r19_line r20_phr

LMNL.text: Teach thou a larger speech to my loosed tongue,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r17_quatrain r18_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r17_quatrain r18_s r21_line r22_phr

LMNL.text: And to mine opened eyes thy secrets give,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r17_quatrain r18_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r17_quatrain r18_s r23_line r24_phr

LMNL.text: That in thy perfect love I learn to live,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r17_quatrain r18_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r17_quatrain r18_s r25_line r26_phr

LMNL.text: And in thine immortality be young.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_tercet r29_s r30_line r31_phr

LMNL.text: The soul is not on earth an alien thing

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_tercet r29_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_tercet r29_s r32_line r33_phr

LMNL.text: That hath her life's rich sources otherwhere;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_tercet r29_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_tercet r29_s r34_line r35_phr

LMNL.text: She is a parcel of the sacred air.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r36_tercet r37_s r38_line r39_phr

LMNL.text: She takes her being from the breath of Spring,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r36_tercet r37_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r36_tercet r37_s r40_line r41_phr

LMNL.text: The glance of Phoebus is her fount of light,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r36_tercet r37_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r36_tercet r37_s r42_line r43_phr

LMNL.text: And her long sleep a draught of primal night.
